content.webTitle: The great British art quiz: set by Gallery Oldham

fields.headline: The great British art quiz: set by Gallery Oldham
fields.bodyText: This quiz is brought to you in collaboration with Art UK, the online home for the UK’s public art collections, showing art from over 3,000 venues and by 45,000 artists. Each day, a different collection on Art UK will set the questions. Today, our questions are set by Gallery Oldham, located in Lancashire, which contains fine art, social and natural history collections, including around 5,000 works of art. You can see art from Gallery Oldham on Art UK here.
